abstract: American Skiing has agreed to sell the Killington and Pico ski resorts in Vermont for $83.5 million, four days after disclosing the sale of Mount Snow in southern Vermont and the Attitash ski area in New Hampshire. The resorts were sold to SP Land, a Dallas real estate investor, and Powdr, a resort company based in Utah and the sales include all of the real estate owned by Killington and Pico. SP Land will assume about $5 million in debt as part of the purchase.
